also_known_as: ピョートル・アダムチク
biography: Piotr Aleksander Adamczyk is a Polish film, television, voice and theatre actor. He is known for portraying pianist and composer Frédéric Chopin in the biographical film Chopin: Desire for love, Pope John Paul II in the TV miniseries Karol: A Man Who Became Pope (2005) and its sequel Karol: The Pope, The Man (2006) and Tomas in the Marvel Cinematic Universe Disney+ series Hawkeye (2021).
name: Piotr Adamczyk
